document.full_text: if the lockout is lifted or if players and owners agree on a new labor deal in time, the chicago bears and the st. louis rams will open the preseason aug. 7 in the hall of fame game in canton, ohio.
document.title: with season still uncertain, n.f.l. schedules preseason
lines_and_colors: if the lockout is lifted or if players and owners agree on a new labor deal in time, the chicago bears and the st. louis rams will open the preseason aug. 7 in the hall of fame game in canton, ohio.
